page.title: 03COMMUNITY COUNCIL MINUTES.
page.content: {continued:}unless the farmer paid for the work to be done,it would remain an eyesore. {GARAGES:}having been long requested for the village,people were sad to hear that they will not be built by the R.D.C. {ROAD NAMEPLATES:}these have been ordered for the village. {BRITISH TELECOM:} a new exchange has been opened in the village. {TRAFFIC HAZARD:}requests were made to a householder to cut back a hedge which hindered visibility on a corner. Several potholes in the road were also reported to the B.R.C.Roads Dept. {REPORTS}from the Police,District Council,and Borders Economic Development Council were circulated.
